alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 4:45PM CDT until June 13 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northern Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 445 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bagwell, or 11 miles northwest of Clarksville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Idabel, Broken Bow, Bagwell, Manchester, Detroit, Millerton, Haworth, Garvin, Eagletown, Moon, Cerrogordo, Goodwater, Shinewell, Woodland, America, Oak Hill, Golden, Bokhoma, Farmers Hill and Negley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
